parameters.query: INSERT INTO predictive_insights (yacht_id, equipment_id, insight_type, title, description, recommendation, severity, metadata) VALUES ('{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.yacht_id }}', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.equipment_id }}', 'threshold_crossing', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.title }}', 'Auto-generated from predictive engine - critical risk threshold crossed', 'Immediate inspection and maintenance recommended', 'critical', jsonb_build_object('source', 'micro_action_dispatcher', 'original_insight_id', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.insight_id }}')) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

INSERT INTO notifications (yacht_id, equipment_id, type, title, message, priority, metadata) VALUES ('{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.yacht_id }}', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.equipment_id }}', 'risk_alert', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.title }}', 'Critical risk detected on {{ $node["Extract Input"].json.equipment_name }}. Immediate action required.', 'critical', jsonb_build_object('insight_id', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.insight_id }}', 'severity', 'critical'))
UPDATE equipment SET attention_flag = true, attention_reason = 'Critical risk threshold crossed', attention_updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.equipment_id }}'

INSERT INTO predictive_insights (yacht_id, equipment_id, insight_type, title, description, recommendation, severity, metadata) VALUES ('{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.yacht_id }}', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.equipment_id }}', 'threshold_crossing', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.title }}', 'Auto-generated from predictive engine - high risk threshold crossed', 'Schedule inspection within 48 hours', 'high', jsonb_build_object('source', 'micro_action_dispatcher', 'original_insight_id', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.insight_id }}')) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

INSERT INTO search_suggestions (yacht_id, equipment_id, suggestion_text, priority, category, metadata, expires_at, created_at) VALUES ('{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.yacht_id }}', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.equipment_id }}', 'Check {{ $node["Extract Input"].json.equipment_name }} - elevated risk detected', 10, 'predictive_alert', jsonb_build_object('insight_id', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.insight_id }}', 'severity', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.severity }}'), NOW() + INTERVAL '7 days', NOW()) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

INSERT INTO search_suggestions (yacht_id, equipment_id, suggestion_text, priority, category, metadata, expires_at, created_at) VALUES ('{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.yacht_id }}', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.equipment_id }}', 'Monitor {{ $node["Extract Input"].json.equipment_name }} - risk increasing', 5, 'predictive_alert', jsonb_build_object('insight_id', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.insight_id }}', 'severity', '{{ $node["Extract Input"].json.severity }}'), NOW() + INTERVAL '7 days', NOW()) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

parameters.jsCode:
// Collect results for critical actions
return [{ json: { actions: ['insight', 'notification', 'equipment_flag'], severity: 'critical' } }];

// Collect results for high actions
return [{ json: { actions: ['insight', 'search_priority'], severity: 'high' } }];

// Collect results for elevated actions
return [{ json: { actions: ['search_priority'], severity: 'elevated' } }];

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: true, equipment_id: $node["Extract Input"].json.equipment_id, severity: $node["Extract Input"].json.severity, actions_triggered: $json.actions || ['completed'] }) }}
